Plot: Ethan longs to escape his small Southern town. He meets a mysterious new girl, Lena. Together, they uncover dark secrets about their respective families, their history and their town.
Title: Beautiful Creatures
Writer: Richard LaGravenese (screenplay), Kami Garcia (based on the novel "Beautiful Creatures" by), Margaret Stohl (based on the novel "Beautiful Creatures" by)
Actors: Alden Ehrenreich, Alice Englert, Jeremy Irons, Viola Davis
tomatoConsensus: Charming romantic leads and esteemed supporting cast aside, Beautiful Creatures is a plodding YA novel adaptation that feels watered down for the Twilight set.
